XXbsu040_u:0: Vinayaviniścaya upāliparipṛcchā namo buddhāya // tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmānupaliḥ pratisaṃlayanāta vyutthāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu040_u:1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikāntaṃ nyasīdat /
XXbsu040_u:3: iha bhagavanmamaikākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīna cittasyāyamevaṃrupaścetasi cetaḥparivitarka udapādi /
XXbsu040_u:4: prātimokṣasaṃvaro bhagavatā prajñaptaścādhiśīlaśikṣā pariśuddhiḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānām ca /
XXbsu040_u:5: bodhisatvāyānikānāṃ tu bhagavatā jīvitaparityāge 'pi śikṣāpyatra parideśitā nirdiṣṭā /
XXbsu040_u:6: tat kathaṃ bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya tiṣṭhato vā śrāvakayānikānāṃ prātimokṣasaṃvaro vaktavyaḥ
XXbsu040_u:10: tasya me bhagavan vijñāpayatūpāyakauśalyaṃ samprakāśayatu bhagavan yathā bhagavataḥ sakāśāt sammukhaṃ śrutvā sammukhaṃ pratigṛhya vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ parṣatsu vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeyam ayaṃ me bhagavannekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasyaivaṃrupaścetasi cetaḥ parivitarka udapādi yattvahaṃ bhagavantamusaṃkramya vinayaviniścayaṃ paripṛccheyamiti /
XXbsu040_u:11: tat sādhu bhagavan vyākarotu tathāgato vinayaviniścayaṃ vistareṇa mahatī bhikṣuparṣata sannipatitā bodhisattvaparṣacca /
XXbsu040_u:13: tasmāttarhitvamupāle anyena prayogeṇānyenādhyāśayena śrāvakayānikānāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ vada
XXbsu040_u:18: tatropāleyā śrāvakayānikasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā mahāyānikasya bodhisattvasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
XXbsu040_u:19: yā mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
XXbsu040_u:22: iyaṃ śrāvakayānikasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā mahāyānikasya bodhisatvasyā pariśuddhaśīlata paramadauḥ śīlyañca /
XXbsu040_u:23: katamopāle mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā yā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśilyañca /
XXbsu040_u:27: iyaṃ mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
XXbsu040_u:28: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle sānurakṣāṃ śikṣāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vada /
XXbsu040_u:34: kathaṃ copāle sānurakṣā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ niranurakṣā śikṣā śrāvaka yānikānām /
XXbsu040_u:35: ihopāle mahāyāna saṃprasthitena bodhisattvena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ hitamanuvartitavyaṃ na punaḥ śrāvakayānikena /
XXbsu040_u:36: anenopāle paryyāyeṇa sānurakṣā śikṣā mahāyānikānām bodhisattvānāṃ niranurakṣā śikṣā śrāvakayānikānām
XXbsu040_u:37: kathaṃ copāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasamprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ niḥ parihārāśikṣā śrāvakayānikānām
XXbsu040_u:39: saceta pūrvvāṇhasamaye āpattimāpadyeta madhyānhakāle sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ
XXbsu040_u:41: sacenmadhyānhasamaye āpattimāpadyate sāyānhakāle sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ evaṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
XXbsu040_u:42: sacet sāyānhasamaey āpattimāpadyeta rātryāḥ purimayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ
XXbsu040_u:44: sacet rātryāḥ purimayāme āpattimāpadyeta rātryāśca madhyamayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
XXbsu040_u:46: sacet rātryā madhyamayāme āpattimāpadyeta rātryāśca paścimayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
XXbsu040_u:48: evaṃ hyupāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ /
XXbsu040_u:49: tatra bodhisattvena nātra kaukṛtyaparyyutthānamutpādyaṃ nātivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
XXbsu040_u:50: tatropāle sacecchrāvakayānikaḥ punaḥ punarāpattimāpadyeta naṣṭaḥ śrāvakayānikasya śīlaskandho veditavyaḥ /
XXbsu040_u:52: ādīpta śiraścailopamena hi śrāvakayānikena bhavitavyaṃ sarvakleśaprahāṇāya /
XXbsu040_u:53: evaṃ niḥparihārā śikṣā śrāvakayānikasya hyupāle parinirvvāṇakāmasya /
XXbsu040_u:54: katham copāle dūrānupraviṣṭā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvnāṃ sāvadānā śikṣā śrāvakayānikānāṃ
XXbsu040_u:55: ihopāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍitvā ramitvā paricārayitvā bodhicittaṃ notsṛjati /
XXbsu040_u:58: bhaviṣyatyupāle sa kālaḥ sa samayo yanmahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvastenaiva bodhicittena suparigṛhītena svapnāntaragato 'pi sarvvakleśairnna saṃhariṣyate /
XXbsu040_u:59: api ca mahāyānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvena naikasminneva bhave sarvvakleśāḥ kṣapayitavyāḥ
XXbsu040_u:61: paripakvakuśalamūlena ca śrāvakayānikenādīptaśi śacailopamena hi tatkṣaṇikokapi bhavopapattirnnotpāditavyā
XXbsu040_u:62: evamupāle dūrānupraviṣṭā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sāvadānāṃ śikṣā śrāvakayānikānām
XXbsu040_u:63: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle sānurakṣāṃ saparihārāṃ dūrānupraviṣṭāṃ śikṣāṃ mahāyānasamprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vada /
XXbsu040_u:64: niranurakṣāṃ niḥparihārām sāvadānāṃ śikṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ vada /
XXbsu040_u:67: mahāyānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvenā prameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃdhārayituṃ saṃsarituma /
XXbsu040_u:68: idaṃ copāle 'rthavaśaṃ sampaśyan tathāgataḥ samyaksambuddho mahāyānāsaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvnāṃ
XXbsu040_u:69: naikāntanirvvedakathāṃ kathayati naikāntavirāgakathāṃ kathayati naikāntavirāgakathāṃ kathayati naikāntasaṃvegakathāṃkathaṃyati /
XXbsu040_u:70: api tu khalu punaḥ prītikathāṃ prāmodyakathām pratityasamutpādasamprayuktakathāṃ kathayati
XXbsu040_u:74: ta imāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā 'bhiratāḥ saṃprāptā na parikhidyante
XXbsu040_u:77: yā imā bhagavannāpattayaḥ kāścidrāgasaṃyuktāḥ kāścit dveṣāsaṃyuktāḥ kāścinmohasaṃyuktāḥ /
XXbsu040_u:78: tatra katamā bhagavan mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya gurutarā āpattayaḥ
XXbsu040_u:79: / kiṃ rāgasaṃprayuktā utāho dveṣasaṃprayuktāḥ utāho mohasaṃprayuktāḥ /
XXbsu040_u:81: sacedupāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā rāgasaṃprayuktā āpattīrāpadyeta yāñcaikāṃ dveṣasaṃprayuktāmāpattimāpadyeta bodhisattvayānaṃ pramāṇīkṛtyeya tābhyo gurutarā āpattiryeyam dveṣaprayuktā
XXbsu040_u:82: / tat kasmāddhetordveṣa upāle sattvaparityāgāya saṃvarttate rāgaḥ
XXbsu040_u:84: tatropāle yaḥ kleśaḥ sattvasaṃgrahāya saṃvarttate tatra bodhisattvasya na chalaṃ na bhayam
XXbsu040_u:85: yaḥ kleśaḥ sattvaparityāgāya saṃvarttate tatra bodhisattvasya chalañca bhayañca /
XXbsu040_u:86: api tūpāle uktam pūrvvameva rāgo bandhavirāgo 'lpasāvadyo dveṣah kṣipravirāgo mahāsāvadyaḥ
XXbsu040_u:89: yaḥ kṣipravirāgo mahāsāvadyaḥ kleśaḥ sa bodhisattvasya svapnāntaragatasyāpi naiva yuktaḥ /
XXbsu040_u:90: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle bodhisattvānaṃ yāḥ kāścid rāgasaṃprayuktā āpattayaḥ sarvvāstā anāpattaya iti dhāraya /
XXbsu040_u:91: tatropāle ye 'nupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste rāgasaṃprayuktābhya āpatibhyo vibhyati na dveṣasamprayuktābhyaḥ
XXbsu040_u:92: ye punarupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste dveṣasaṃprayuktābhya āpattibhyo vibhyati na rāgasamprayuktābhyaḥ
XXbsu040_u:93: atha khalu te tasyāmeva parṣadi mañjuśrīkumarabhūtaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt /
XXbsu040_u:98: ātyantavinītān sarvvadharmān jānīyustadapi na bhūyastathāgato vinayaḥ prajñāpyeta /
